meanings.sent1: The knight wore an armored suit for battle.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers marched in their armored vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was funny to wear an armored costume for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt armored against any more pain.
meanings.sent5: The armored fortress stood strong against the enemy's attacks.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed an armored suit from ancient times.
meanings.sent2: The tank was heavily armored for protection in combat.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked adorable in its tiny armored vest.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an armored shield, deflecting any criticism.
meanings.sent5: The armored car transported the valuable cargo securely.

meanings.sent1: The brave knight stood proudly in his armored attire.
meanings.sent2: The warrior was fully armored from head to toe.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found an armored nut and couldn't crack it open.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like being armored with invincibility.
meanings.sent5: The armored figure in the painting seemed to come to life.
